markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Warden](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3562)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Wardens are the chief guardians of borders and frontiers. Whether standing watch over a single village or an entire region, wardens keep a vigilant eye out for threats to their charges. Wardens are stalwart folk, often called to duty by Erastil to protect those around them. Be it times of war or along the frontier, wardens are often the balanced edge of a blade between a community and the wilds at its fringes.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Warden](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3562)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 117

**Perception** +17

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +15, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=4), [Bastard Sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=15), [Bedroll](/Equipment.aspx?ID=7), [Compass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=16), _+1 [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=434)_ (10 arrows), [Flint and Steel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=21), [maps](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3585), [pup tent](/Equipment.aspx?ID=57), [Scale Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=8)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +11 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 100

</row>

**Warding Strike** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** One of the warden's enemies within 100 feet attacks one of the warden's allies or a person the warden is sworn to protect; **Effect** The warden Strikes the triggering enemy. If the Strike hits, the enemy's attack is deflected, reducing its damage by 8, or by 16 if the warden's Strike was a critical hit.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bastard sword +16 ([two-hand d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d8+10 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+10 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite longbow_ +17 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+8 piercing

**Warden's Protection**   A warden deals an extra 1d8 damage to any creature trespassing on the territory the warden protects.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-545" />
name: Warden

Wardens are stalwart folk, often called to duty by Erastil to protect those around them. Be it times of war or along the frontier, wardens are often the balanced edge of a blade between a community and the wilds at its fringes. If the Strike hits, the enemy's attack is deflected, reducing its damage by 8, or by 16 if the warden's Strike was a critical hit. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action bastard sword +16 (two-hand d12), Damage 1d8+10 slashing Melee Single Action fist +16 (Agile, Nonlethal, Unarmed), Damage 1d4+10 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action composite longbow +17 (deadly d10, Magical, Propulsive, range increment 100 feet, reload 0, volley 30 feet), Damage 1d8+8 piercing Warden's Protection A warden deals an extra 1d8 damage to any creature trespassing on the territory the warden protects.
